title: FPS issues
body:
Hi, I need help, for no reason i have lags after 6.22 Patch. Please help! (Windows 7, laptop)
In 6.21 i had ~220 FPS and now in 6.22 i strugling on ~67 FPS.

replies.body:
FPS issues can be caused by a variety of different things, however, the most common are issues with display drivers or your windows power settings. I recommend working through our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to address the most common solutions that we're aware of for this issue.

Let me know if those steps caused any change in your framerate.
